programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (2019, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror Classics)

programme.title: The Uninvited, (2009, Thriller)

programme.sub-title: Anamaneki: The Tunnel With No Exit

programme.title: Ghost Stories

programme.sub-title: The Shadows of Horror: The Talking Mary Doll

programme.sub-title: A Mother's Feelings: The Nurse Who Announces Death

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: A ghostly painter with the ability to trap souls within his work has reawakened, and not even the other ghosts of the old schoolhouse want anything to do with him.
programme.sub-title: Da Vinci: The Picture That Swallows People

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Convinced that a ghost is haunting a train crossing, Leo takes the gang out to try and catch the spirit in a photo. When one of those photos shows a strange hand on Momoko's shoulder, things start getting bad, and a tale of revenge unfolds.
programme.sub-title: Railroad Crossing of Evil: The Ghost Photograph That Takes Lives

programme.desc: Satsuki falls in with a bad crowd, or it might be better to say coven. Several girls at her school conspire to cast spells together, and she reluctantly joins in.

programme.desc: Following an accident on the job, Satsuki's father is injured, but Leo thinks ghosts are behind it.

programme.desc: The gang takes a trip to the mountains to stay at a resort run by Satsuki's cousin Miyuki. However, upon arrival, a young girl tells them that Miyuki is dead. It seems that her ghost still haunts the frozen lake, turning it blood red.
programme.sub-title: The Snow Specter: The Horror of Bloodstained Lake!!

programme.sub-title: Curse of Death: The Headless Rider!!

programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: Event Horizon (1997)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: The Other Guys (2010)
programme.desc: Two deskbound detectives get more than they bargain for when they take on a seemingly minor case that may turn out to be New Yorks biggest crime.

programme.title: The Mexican (2001)
programme.desc: A bungling gangster (Brad Pitt) must reform to please his girlfriend (Julia Roberts) but still has one last job to fulfill.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail (2020)
programme.desc: Indebted to a mobster, a desperate producer tries to "accidentally" kill an aging movie star for an insurance scam. However, he soon begins to realize that the film theyre shooting is a masterpiece in the making.

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: Wander (2020)
programme.desc: Hired to investigate a suspicious death in the town of Wander, a paranoid private eye with a troubled past becomes convinced the case is linked to the same conspiracy and cover-up that caused the death of his daughter.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.sub-title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a traveling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: For Lieutenant Pete "Maverick" Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick "Goose" Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy will threaten Petes dreams of becoming an ace pilot.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick (2022)
programme.desc: Pete "Maverick" Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navys top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Paid in Full (2002)
programme.desc: A dry cleaners delivery boy becomes one of the most powerful drug dealers in 1980s Harlem. Based on a true story.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: All Up in the Biz (2023)
programme.desc: Celebrity interviews and rare archival footage provide insight into the life and legacy of hip-hop icon Biz Markie.

programme.title: Norbit (2007)
programme.desc: Though married to a terrible shrew, a man (Eddie Murphy) tries to figure out a way to be with his childhood sweetheart (Thandie Newton), who has just moved back into town.

programme.title: The Longest War
programme.desc: The human stories and drama behind Americas involvement in Afghanistan, now the longest war in U.S. history; features interviews with intelligence operatives, soldiers, families, Afghan officials, journalists, and government and military officials.

programme.title: Ready for War (2019)
programme.desc: Thousands of immigrants volunteer to serve in the U.S. military -- but then find themselves deported once their tours of duty are over.

programme.title: Serpico (1973)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Chuck (2016)
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.

programme.title: Fighting (2009)
programme.desc: A scam artist (Terrence Howard) introduces a young man (Channing Tatum) to New Yorks bare-knuckle street-fighting circuit.

programme.title: Danger Close (2019)
programme.desc: Australian and New Zealand soldiers face overwhelming odds as they fight for their lives during the Battle of Long Tan in Vietnam.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: The Machinist (2004)
programme.desc: Cryptic notes and encounters with a mysterious stranger torment a drill-press operator (Christian Bale) who has not slept in a year.

programme.title: The Crow (1994)
programme.desc: A black bird resurrects a rock musician (Brandon Lee) who then avenges his own murder and his fiancees.

programme.title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies and the FBI
programme.desc: The story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter; exploring the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis (2002)
programme.desc: The crew (Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner) of the Enterprise must prevent a replica of Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) from overtaking Earth.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: Fatman (2020)
programme.desc: After receiving a lump of coal in his stocking, a disgruntled 12-year-old hires a highly skilled assassin to kill Santa Claus.
